name: concrete-productivity-modified
title: Concrete Productivity Modified
author: marc40k, R3CONN3R
description:
Cheaper concrete!!

Adds Research to increase concrete productivity by 25%. 

First level is unlocked with blue science, and the last level with space science. 
The mod also adds infinite research. This version adds support for Dectorio's Concrete Grid and adds foundry recipes for it and refined concrete.
